From: "Martin G. Weinberg" 
Subject: RE: Call today 
Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 16:03:31 +0000 
speak at 3 
Marty 
Martin G. Weinberg, Esq. 
 This Electronic Message contains information from the Law Office 
of Martin G. Weinberg, P.C., and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee 
only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents 
of this message is prohibited. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 11:58 AM 
To: Martin G. Weinber 
Cc 
Subject: RE: Call today 
Happy to, but I'm not sure I have Mike's number. Would you please send it to me? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
From: Martin G. Weinberg 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 11:56 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Call today 
Yes, please 
Would you also be able to call Mike Miller at his Steptoe Office and conference us? If not I will ask Mike to arrange a call 
in. 
EFTA00021386

Martin 
G. Weinberg, Esq.

From:
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 11:50 AM 
To: Martin G. Weinbe 
Cc: 'Marc Fernich' 'Weingarten, Rei d 
Subject: RE: Call today 
3pm works for us. Should we call your cell? 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
From 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 11:44 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Call today 
[  am available by cell at 2. If you were available at or shortly after 3, Mike Miller could join us. 
Thanks, Marty 
Martin G. Weinberg, Esq. 
This Electronic Message contains information from the Law Office

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 11:38 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
EFTA00021387

Subject: RE: Call today 
Thanks Marty. Can we plan for a  2pm call? We should be able to discuss your comments about the protective order at 
that time as 
well. 
Please let us know what number to call. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Sent: Wednesday, July 21IWIR. 
From: Martin Weinberg 
To: 
Cc: Marc Fernich Weingarten, 
Reid 
Subject: Re: Call today 
I am available at or after 
Marty 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 24, 2019, at 10:36 AM, 
All, 
wrote: 
Would one or some combination of you be available for a call today? We understand there was an incident involving Mr. 
Epstein at the MCC, and we'd like to touch base with you about it. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00021388
